In the past, I've only seen the "failed to load translation" error when an edit was made to locale settings to change the client Language to one that is not supported on the region. 

PvP.net Kernel errors are generally caused by League not having the right permissions to run properly. This is because League interacts with a ton of files outside of the League installation folder and certain software packages. Ensure League has the right system permissions by following our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). 

Let me know if you still see issues after taking those steps.
